page.title: 09GOLF, LITTLE WALTHAM
page.content: Channels Golf Club is situated on the outskirts of Little Waltham.The original 9 hole course, opened in 1974 was constructed on what had been Channels Farm. An additional 9 holes were added in 1978 extending the course over disused gravel workings. The irregular features of the old gravel pits provide an undulating surface. The farm house, part of which dates from the 14th. and 17th. centuries, has been renovated to provide a club house. Adjacent to the club house is a large barn, that has been restored, and is used both for club and private functions.The stable block has also been put to good use, and houses a shop and offices. There are 640 members of various categories,and some block memberships.
